title: Ep 269: Titties & Tassles (Ft. The Sweet Spot)
itunes:title: Ep 269: Titties & Tassles (Ft. The Sweet Spot)
description:
On this week’s episode, your favorite duo is joined by the owners of The Sweet Spot, an all black traveling Burlesque company. The group discusses the history of burlesque and how it has transformed over the years. Is Burlesque similar, if not the exact same, as stripping? From tips to titties with tassels, the discussion introduces seduction in a space without sex. From discussing how to use all senses to arouse your partner along (https://expmag.com/2019/06/the-science-of-attraction/ ) to a man who married three identical triplets (https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/world-news/man-marrying-identical-triplets-says-26781655), enjoy the educational and funny adventure of diving into all things burlesque.

Want to experience a play party hosted by Mandii B? Join us Sunday, May 29th in New York City!! Submit your vetting form here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScM9byQH9HiQUwvvKcifAaNGulbgH7_aJDpD5J76c7epFfsCA/viewform and purchase your tickets once approved. Visit Limitlessluxels.com for more details and future events in a city near you If you want to share a heaux mail or heaux tale, email us at whoreibledecisions@gmail.com Follow the hosts on social media Weezy @Weezywtf & Mandii B @Fullcourtpumps and follow the Whoreible Decisions pages Instagram @whoreible_decisions Twitter @whoreiblepod Don't forget to tag #whoreibledecisions or @ us to let us know what you think of this week's episode!
